input.requirements_yaml:
meta:
  original_request: Automated retail personalization platform
input.product_vision:
product_name: Aura Retail AI
product_summary: Aura Retail AI is an automated platform designed to empower retailers
  by delivering highly personalized shopping experiences to their customers. It leverages
  data and AI to understand individual customer preferences, predict needs, and tailor
  interactions across various touchpoints, ultimately driving engagement, conversion,
  and loyalty.
target_users:
- Retail enterprise decision-makers
- E-commerce managers
- Marketing and merchandising teams
value_proposition:
- Increase customer lifetime value through hyper-personalized experiences.
- Boost sales and conversion rates by presenting relevant products and offers.
- Enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty by anticipating individual needs.
- Optimize marketing spend by targeting customers with precision.
key_capabilities:
- Real-time customer segmentation
- AI-driven product recommendations
- Dynamic pricing adjustments
- Personalized promotional campaign orchestration
- Customer journey analytics with personalization insights
non_goals:
- General purpose CRM system
- Point-of-sale (POS) system
- Inventory management system
- Generic business intelligence (BI) platform without personalization focus
success_metrics:
- Increase in conversion rate from personalized interactions
- Growth in average order value (AOV)
- Improvement in customer retention rate
- ROI of personalization campaigns

input.product_vision:
product_name: Adaptive Telemedicine Optimizer (ATO)
product_summary: A system designed to dynamically optimize resource allocation and
  patient scheduling within telemedicine platforms. It aims to improve operational
  efficiency, enhance patient access to care, and maximize clinician utilization through
  intelligent, adaptive algorithms.
target_users:
- Telemedicine platform administrators
- Clinic managers
- Healthcare providers
- Patients (indirectly, through improved service)
value_proposition:
- Reduce patient wait times and improve access to virtual care.
- Increase clinician utilization and reduce scheduling inefficiencies.
- Lower operational costs for telemedicine service providers.
- Enhance the overall scalability and responsiveness of telemedicine services.
key_capabilities:
- Real-time demand forecasting for telemedicine consultations.
- Dynamic scheduling and intelligent assignment of healthcare providers.
- Patient-provider matching based on specialty, availability, and urgency.
- Optimization of virtual resource allocation (e.g., virtual rooms, consultation slots).
- Performance analytics and reporting for continuous optimization insights.
non_goals:
- Direct patient diagnosis, treatment, or medical advice.
- Comprehensive Electronic Health Record (EHR) system functionality.
- Billing, payment processing, or insurance claim management.
- General practice management features unrelated to optimization.
success_metrics:
- Reduction in average patient wait times for virtual appointments.
- Increase in clinician utilization rate and reduction in idle time.
- Percentage improvement in telemedicine platform operational efficiency.
- Improvement in patient satisfaction scores related to scheduling and access.
